Title: Hollywood Chainsaw Hookers
Writer: Fred Olen Ray (screenplay), T.L. Lankford (screenplay), Fred Olen Ray (screenplay drastically rewritten and improved upon by), T.L. Lankford (screenplay drastically rewritten and improved upon by)
Actors: Gunnar Hansen, Linnea Quigley, John Henry Richardson, Dawn Wildsmith
Plot: A detective embarks on a mission to track down a woman in L.A.'s seedy nightclubs, only to come face-to-face with a blood-thirsty cult of lethally beautiful prostitutes. Is he the next victim of Hollywood's demented Chainsaw Hookers?
